column3: Latest;Kompong Speu:------  The Anti-Human Trafficking and Juvenile Protection Bureau
column4: led by Colonel Moun Moul Mali
column5: raided a massage shop in Kai Vi village
column8: Kampong Speu province on 24 June 2020 at 4:30 pm.------The owner of the location
column11: was arrested. The operation liberated two women workers who were promised jobs as massage therapists
column12: but instead were forced into prostitution.------The business owner will be sent to court after a file is prepared
column13: and the victims were transferred to a specialist to help vulnerable women. ------AREY
